text: Loyola Beach is an unincorporated community in Kleberg County, Texas, United States. Leo Kaufer Park is located in Loyola Beach, with a fishing pier, boat dock, and playground. ==Education== Education is provided by Riviera Independent School District and Ricardo Independent School District. ==See also== *Kingsville micropolitan area ==External links== * Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas Category:Unincorporated communities in Kleberg County, Texas Category:Kingsville, Texas micropolitan area
title: Loyola Beach, Texas
